amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a 1 percent increase each year in the deductable rather than the one-half percent increase each year in the deductable required by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 110-333 to raise the deductible set at 5% above $1,000,000,000 by 1% each program year, rather than by .5% as the bill is written.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 882).
